title: I'm on a quest! Any Rioter(s) interested in assisting me?
body:
Hello Beta forums. 

As the title says, I am on a quest in need of Riot assistance.

My quest originated on the EUW forums, and after some time I leveled up an NA account to lvl5 so I could also spread out to the NA forums. Now, I have decided to go even further, and come to the Beta forums.

The details of my quest can be found in my [EUW thread](http://forums.euw.leagueoflegends.com/board/showthread.php?t=1525526&highlight=), while my [NA thread](http://forums.na.leagueoflegends.com/board/showthread.php?t=4188761&highlight=) also refers to my thread on EUW.

Dear Riot employees visiting these Beta forums, your assistance would be greatly appreciated.

Kind regards,
Jens DV

replies.body:
I had to go to the DMV this morning, so a hug sounds pretty good right now.

(>;_;)>

<(^_^<)

Thanks <3

I hope everything turned out okay at the DMV.

A poem for thee:

> A cuddling Jens on a quest I do see,
> 
> To hug all the Ritos, (and that includes me).
> 
> I wish you good luck on your noble endeavor,
>
> And as far as hugs go, I give the best ever!

{{summoner:6}} {{summoner:4}} {{summoner:1}}
